plot: Former governor of Mountjoy Prison, John Lonergan, brings us on a journey around Ireland looking at the way we educate our children while exploring why the 'One Size Fits All' approach to the way we teach does not work for everyone.
title: John Lonergan's School Principles
plot_es: Former governor of Mountjoy Prison, John Lonergan, brings us on a journey around Ireland looking at the way we educate our children while exploring why the 'One Size Fits All' approach to the way we teach does not work for everyone.
plot_en: Former governor of Mountjoy Prison, John Lonergan, brings us on a journey around Ireland looking at the way we educate our children while exploring why the 'One Size Fits All' approach to the way we teach does not work for everyone.
